name: Patagonia Cotton Quilt Snap-T Pullover - Men's
description: Diamond-quilted, heritage-inspired version of our classic Snap-T® Pullover is made of organic cotton/polyester fabric for everyday warmth.Warm, diamond-quilted organic cotton/polyester jersey blendPullover with 4-snap nylon placket and stand-up collarLeft-chest pocket with nylon flap and snap closureY-Joint sleeves for increased mobility through the shoulders and armsCuffs and hem have spandex trimFeatures P-6 label on the left chestHip length
